cause.description:
To be the same fans that we were for the Cavs and help the Tribe back to the World Series for the first time in ten years
1. To be true to the Tribe
2. To be the best fans in the land
3. To Fill the Jake and start a new sell out streak
cause.mission: rise up and show the nation that the Indians are the best time in baseball
cause.name: The 2007 World Series Champion Cleveland Indians
